chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
y: lb
x: lb

Goal:
x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y

Premises:
lb_join_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↑ x0 ≂ y ↑ y0
lb_ortho_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0 < -> y ⟂ y0
lb_ortho_join : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x ↑ y < -> a ⟂ x /\ a ⟂ y
lb_ortho_meet_nil : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y < -> x ↓ y ≂ nil
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ≂ y ↓ y0
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
lb_nat_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> ⟦ x ⟧ = ⟦ y ⟧
lb_mask_equiv_cons : forall x y : bool, x = y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x :: x0 ≂ y :: y0
lb_mask_le_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⪯ x0 < -> y ⪯ y0
lb_join_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_join_mono H2 H5) (lb_join_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_join Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_join_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y ->...-> x ↑ x0 ⪯ y ↑ y0 /\ y ↑ y0 ⪯ x ↑ x0 Arguments lb_join_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive = lb_mask_equiv_trans : Transitive lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive : forall [x y z : lb], x ≂ y -> y ≂ z -> x ⪯ z /\ z ⪯ x Arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive [x y z]
lb_plus_eq : forall (a : bool) (x y : lb), x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> lb_plus a x x0 ≂ lb_plus a y y0
lb_ortho_iff_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_ortho_anti H3 H6) (lb_ortho_anti H2 H5) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> iff) lb_ortho Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_ortho_iff_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> (x ⟂ x0 -> y ⟂ y0) /\ (y ⟂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0...
lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric = lb_mask_equiv_sym : Symmetric lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> y ⪯ x /\ x ⪯ y Arguments lb_mask_equiv_rst_Symmetric [x y]
equal_lb_mask_equiv : forall x y : nat, x = y < -> ⟬ x ⟭ ≂ ⟬ y ⟭
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
binary_le_le : forall x y : nat, x ≲ y -> x <= y
binary_le_lb_mask : forall x y : nat, x ≲ y -> ⟬ x ⟭ ⪯ ⟬ y ⟭
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
lb_nat_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) => (let H0 : forall l m : lb, l ≂ m -> ⟦ l ⟧ = ⟦ m ⟧ := fun l m : lb => match lb_mask_equiv_equal l m with | conj x0 _ => x0 end in H0) x y H : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> eq) lb_nat Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> ⟦ x ⟧ = ⟦ y ⟧ Arguments lb_nat_eq_Proper [x y]
lb_mask_leb : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
lb_join_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), (x :: l) ↑ (y :: m) = x || y :: l ↑ m
lb_meet_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_meet_mono H2 H5) (lb_meet_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_meet Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y ->...-> x ↓ x0 ⪯ y ↓ y0 /\ y ↓ y0 ⪯ x ↓ x0 Arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
lb_mask_inv_cons : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⪯ y :: m -> x ⪦ y /\ l ⪯ m
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
BinInt.Z.lt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
lb_pointwise_sym : forall (f : bool -> bool -> bool) (l m : lb), (forall x y : bool, f x y = f y x) -> lb_pointwise f l m = lb_pointwise f m l
